author: Zachary Cohen, Alex Marquardt and Kylie Atwood, CNN
title: Blame game escalates between US and China over coronavirus
description: President Donald Trump says he has declared war on the coronavirus in an effort to contain the outbreak and its economic impact here at home, but on the world stage, his administration is engaged in another battle as the US and China fight to shape the narrat…
